eu.amidst.core.classifiers

Class NaiveBayesClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.classifiers.NaiveBayesClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Classifier

    public class NaiveBayesClassifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements Classifier
    The NaiveBayesClassifier class implements the interface Classifier and defines a Naive Bayes Classifier.

      • isParallelMode

        public boolean isParallelMode()
        Returns whether the parallel mode is supported or not.
        Returns:

      • setParallelMode

        public void setParallelMode(boolean parallelMode)
        Sets the parallel mode for this NaiveBayesClassifier.
        Parameters:
        parallelMode - boolean equals to true if the parallel mode is supported, and false otherwise.

      • predict

        public double[] predict(DataInstance instance)
        Predicts the class membership probabilities for a given instance.
        Specified by:
        predict in interface Classifier
        Parameters:
        instance - the data instance to be classified.
        Returns:
        an array of doubles containing the estimated membership probabilities of the data instance for each class label.
